title: MD
biography: Kurt Wüthrich is a Swiss chemist/biophysicist and Nobel Chemistry laureate, known for developing nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) methods for studying biological macromolecules.
aiSummary: Kurt Wüthrich is a structural biology specialist with an H-index of 144 at ETH Zurich (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Nature, Cell. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
